game.name: Catacomb (1989)
game.desc: Catacomb (1989-1990 DOS) contains 10 levels in this first release. Petton Everhail is contacted by Terexin, High Wizard of the Kieralon. Terexin informs him the Kieralon Empire has fallen. Petton must travel to the Kieralon Palace to collect the lost treasures of Terexin, who has offered to split them fifty-fifty. Petton agrees, puts down his cup of Orange Pekoe tea, and marches off for the Catacombs under the Kieralon Palace.
